name: Maze Crawlers
description:
You enter the undergrounds in hopes of finding treasure... but what is that scuttering sound? Maze Crawlers is a 3D maze horror game where you try to collect all the coins and escape before dying.

Controls

Move: WASD

Run: Shift (Hold)

Minimap Zoom: M

Potion: Space

Credits

Game Design and Programming: Annie Zhao

Audio: Zapsplat, Freesound, Freesoundeffect, Hjubris

Art (from Unity Asset Store): Karboosx, Alexander Kotov, Alexander Voevodov, 3dfancy, [prism bucket]
